predicate.note: Frames file for 'release' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'let go'. Except there is no 'let go'.

roleset.name: let go

example.name: active
example.text: NEC released a statement saying "We feel sorry for having caused trouble to society."
example.arg: a statement saying "We feel sorry for having caused trouble to society."

example.name: passive
example.text: [A 50-state study]-1 released *trace*-1 in September by Friends for Education, an Albuquerque NM school-research group....
example.arg: by Friends for Education, an Albuquerque NM school-research group

example.name: with source
example.text: Others-1 just released *trace*-1 from the majors...

roleset.note: Note that a record release is a distinctly different sense, but it takes pretty much the same syntax.
